participant_1.background:
I spent last year learning about music production and working on my photography skills.
i can t stand clutter or dust.
I like to check out the latest aviation news and ballet events on my favorite websites.
I enjoy the peace and quiet of the woods when I go hiking on the weekends.
i make 30k a year.

participant_2.background:
I have a baby monitor in my nursery so I can hear my child when they wake up.
I have to wear a beanie to play soccer in the cold weather, but I still love it.
I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day.
i drive a silver lexus.
i m currently looking for a job in baltimore.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about you?
I am doing well, thank you! I am just enjoying some peace and quiet in the woods while I go hiking.
That sounds lovely! I love peace and quiet too. I have a baby monitor in my nursery so I can hear my child when they wake up.
That is sweet! I am not a parent yet, but I can imagine that is very important.
It is! They are my whole world.
What do you do for work?
I am currently looking for a job in Baltimore. I drive a silver Lexus and I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day.
That sounds like a great way to start your day! I am a music producer and I love to take photos. I spent last year learning about music production and working on my photography skills.
That is really cool! I love music and I love photography too. I usually check out the latest aviation news and ballet events on my favorite websites.
That is awesome! I love ballet too.
It sounds like we have a lot in common!
We do! I would love to chat more with you sometime.
